suggest.amasty/product-labels-graphql: Install amasty/product-labels-graphql module to activate GraphQl and Product Labels integration.
suggest.amasty/module-label-mftf-2: Install module-label-mftf-2 module to implement mftf-tests for Magento 2.3.5+ versions.
suggest.amasty/module-label-mftf-3: Install module-label-mftf-3 module to implement mftf-tests for Magento 2.4.0+ versions.
